businessListings.name: Giermanski Sherry Electrologist
businessListings.description: Sherry Giermanski, Electrologist provides electrolysis "Electrolysis is considered a permanent hair removal method, since it destroys the hair follicle", body sugaring, bikini lines and eyelash extensions. Electrology is permanent hair removal unlike some laser hair removal, eyelash extensions, hair loss, perming eyelashes, tinting eyelashes
services: Electrolysis Hair Removal Eyelash Extensions Body Sugaring Brazilian

businessListings.name: Waxing The City
businessListings.description: You deserve to Look Great and Feel Awesome. At Waxing the City Tempe, we believe YOU are at your best when YOU feel Beautiful, Confident and simply put, Awesome. We are a studio devoted exclusively to the art of waxing, but that's not all. Whether you've been waxing for years or it's your first time, we understand. It's our mission to provide a surprisingly personable experience in a welcoming and fun, team-based environment.

businessListings.name: Salon Design
businessListings.description: Welcome to Salon Design. We are a full service providing the latest styles and color for the whole family. We welcome walk-ins as well as last minute appointments. We are trainined in the newest technology for hair care and treatments. Our expert stylists can help you look your best from hair to make-up. The team at Salon Design is ready to create the look you want. Our Stylist are trained in all aspects of hair, make-up and waxing. Hair weaving and extensions are our specialty Contact us today for your make-over Or book appointment online for your convenience
